column4: evening all, I am about to install Hoary and 2003 server on the same machine, anything I should know before I begin ??
lol
no really
I need both
2003 as in windows?
hav eyou set up partitions already?
install windows first
can I make ntfs or stick to fat32
ah, then leave some space for ubuntu.
if you want r/w access then use FAT32.
depends on the codec
its a new installation so I need most, mp3/mpg/dvd
check out the RestrictedFormats page on the wiki
the wiki says nothing about music player ?
mp3 support: install beep-media-player/xmms that come with their own codec or install gstreamer0.8-mad for mp3 support in totem
for video codecs:
or again, install something like xine-ui or vlc.  they come with their own codecs
try both. :)   but i've seen vlc recommended more
we heard the first time...if someone knows they'll answer. :)
I know someone knows, just waiting for them to speak up
chicken-soup
